game.name: Spooky Mahjong
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: "Spooky Mahjong - Tremble" - a thrilling Halloween mahjong connect puzzle. Match identical tiles to clear the board and conquer levels in this endless adventure. Embrace the haunting ambiance, leave your fears behind, and enjoy an eerie and enjoyable mahjong experience! Happy gaming!
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Spooky Mahjong - Tremble" - a thrilling Halloween mahjong connect puzzle. Match identical tiles to clear the board and conquer levels in this endless adventure. Embrace the haunting ambiance, leave your fears behind, and enjoy an eerie and enjoyable mahjong experience! Happy gaming!
